column3:
There once was a big black and white dog named Forrest. His owner's name was Jeff. Jeff
ewlinethought he was the best dog in the whole world.
ewline
ewlineOne night, when Forrest and Jeff were taking a walk in the park, they saw two men walking
ewlinedown the path. Both men were dressed in very nice suits.
ewline
ewlineJeff waved at the men. 
ewline
ewline"Good evening," he said. "How are you tonight?"
ewline
ewline"Hello," one of the men said. "It is such a great night for walking."
ewline
ewlineJeff and Forrest kept walking down the path. It was a very dark night, but the moon was
ewlineshining bright. When Jeff turned around to look for the two men, he could not see them at
ewlineall. They were nowhere to be seen.
ewline
ewlineLater that night, when their walk was over, Jeff and Forrest were lying on the bed. They
ewlinewere watching a television show about ghosts.
ewline
ewline"Do you think maybe those two men were ghosts?" Jeff said out loud. "They did not leave a
ewlinetrace."
ewline
ewlineForrest was a dog, but he acted like he understood. He barked.
ewline
ewlineJeff smiled. He liked that his dog always saw things the same way he did.
column4: multiple: What time of day did Jeff and Forrest go for a walk?
column9: multiple: Why did Jeff think the men were ghosts?
column11: they chased him and his dog
column14: one: What was the name of Jeff's dog?
column19: one: How many men did Jeff and Forrest see?
